synopsis.text: And so, with a heart full of determination to shed his feminine image, Shiina Aki embarks on a journey to Tokyo, eager to embrace a new life and attend middle school. But as the doors of Sunohara-sou swing open, he is greeted by the warm smile of caretaker Ayaka Sunohara and three charming members of his new school's student council - Yuzu Yukimoto, Sumire Yamanashi, and Yuri Kazami. Little did Aki know that his quest for change would lead him to a vibrant life surrounded by four incredible girls in the heart of Tokyo.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
